verses.1: Topa, ka Pasian aw, sunin huhna kong ngen a, zan hun sungin nangma mai ah kong kiko hi.
verses.2: Ka thungetna hong za inla, nong huh ding ka hong ngetna hong ngai in.
verses.3: Bang hang hiam cih leh lungkhamna tampi thuakin, ka si dektak hi.
verses.4: Kei pen a sidek mi tawh ka kibang ta a, ka thahatna khempeuh bei mang khinta hi.
verses.5: Misite lakah a kinusia, a kithat lum, han sunga lum, na huh zawh ahi nawn lo, na phawk nawn lohte ka bang ta hi.
verses.6: Kei pen, mialin a thukna mun, Leihawm thuk sungah nong koih khinta hi.
verses.7: Nangma hehna keima tungah gik mahmah a, na tuihualte khempeuh tawh kei na hong vukcip hi.
verses.8: Ka kikholh pih mite in kei a hong pelh dingin na hong bawl a, amaute tungah a cikzethuai khatin kei na hong bawl hi. Ka suahtak theih loh nadingin kei hong kikhumcip a,
verses.9: ka gim thuakna hangin ka mit a mial ta hi. Topa aw, nisimin nangma tungah kong ngen a, thu ngenin ka khutte nangma lamah kong zan hi.
verses.10: A si sate adingin nalamdang a bawl na hi hiam? Nangmah a phat dingin mi a si khin sate hong tho ding ahi hiam?
verses.11: Han sungah na itna kip kigen dinga, siatna munah nangma thumannate kigen ding ahi hiam?
verses.12: Khua mialna sungah na nalamdangte kithei a, mangngilhna gam sungah na hotkhiat huhna kithei ahi hiam?
verses.13: Ahih hangin Topa aw, na tungah huhna kong ngen a, zingsang simin na mai ah thu kong ngen hi.
verses.14: Topa aw, bang hangin kei hong paai khia na hi hiam? Bang hangin kei kiang panin na maitang seel na hi hiam?
verses.15: Ka neu tung a kipan gim thuakin ka si dektak hi. Nong gimpiakte ka thuak a, ka cih nading mel ka thei nawn kei hi.
verses.16: Nangma hehna in keimah hong nawk gawp khin a, a lauhuai mahmah nangma hong suk gawpna in kei hong susia ta hi.
verses.17: Amaute in tuikhang bangin sun tawntungin kei hong umcih uh a, kei hong tuamcip uh hi.
verses.18: Kei hong itte le ka lawmte keimah nong pelhsak khin a, khuamial bekbek, keima kikholh pih ahi hi.
